uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.resource

Interface ResourceService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<ResourceService>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultResourceService, ServletResourceService

    public interface ResourceService
extends AppContextService<ResourceService>
    Service for locating resources. By default these will map onto the equivalent Classloader methods but the use of a service allows other mechanisms without the need to install a custom Classloader
    Author:
    spb
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.net.URL getResource(java.lang.String name)
      get an identifying URL for the resource A null result implies the resource cannot be located
      java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String name)
      get an InputStream to read the resource.
